result.arabic_text: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
result.translation: Barafise inkuru nziza iremesha ivuye ku Mana Allah, ko bazororanirwa mu buzima bwo kw’isi[15], n’uko bazohabwa Ubwami bw’ijuru mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa. Nta gihinduka rero mu vyo Imana Allah Yabasezeraniye, iyo ni yo ntsinzi rero ihambaye.
result.footnotes: [15] Biri mu biremesha abatoni b’Imana Allah kw’isi, kurota canke kuroterwa indoto nziza ziremesha.
